Sector.Name: Omicus
Sector.Credits: Omicus sector was designed by Ade Stewart as part of Where The Stars End. The data provided for the sector includes no social details: the region has been remotely surveyed, which has provided extensive physical information about the stars, features, and worlds that lie within it.
Sector.Stylesheet: border.Bw { color: green; style: dotted } border.Dr { color: blue; style: dotted }
